bibl.seg: COTTIER Michel, A New Customs Receipt from Philadelphia at Philadelphia and the λιμὴν Μέμφεως.

Part of the small private collection assembled by Dr. Camden Cobern and sold in 1920 to the University of Pennsylvania. Receipt issued for the collection of the λιμὴν Μέμφεως-tax at the customs-house of Philadelphia. October 14, AD 216.
